name: Army Men - Sarge's Heroes [SDC]
description:
Army Men: Sarge's Heroes is an action-shooter game developed by Saffire, The 3DO Company and Aqua Pacific. It came out on 30-09-1999. 3DO Company, The published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Army Men: Sarge's Heroes on Dreamcast, PlayStation, Nintendo 64 and PC.
